title: Valerie Hanna Acupuncture--NAET provider | Autism Speaks
cleaned_text: September 10, 2018 I am able to provide NAET treatments to children and adults with sensitivities or allergies. NAET is Nambudripad's Allergy Elimination Technique. I will help children with sensitivities to food, clothes, chemicals, plastics, vaccines, radiation etc. I am able to use acupressure for children and adults, or acupuncture for adults who are able. - Languages: - English - Insurances Accepted: - Call for Fee - No Insurance Accepted Address: 9014 Neill lake road Valerie Hanna Our Autism Response Team (ART) is specially trained to connect people with autism, their families, and caretakers to information, tools, and resources.
